com.adidas.connectcore.scv.request

Class UpdateAccountRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adidas.connectcore.scv.request.BaseRequest
      • com.adidas.connectcore.scv.request.UpdateAccountRequest

  • public class UpdateAccountRequest
extends BaseRequest
    Update Account Request model.

    Refer documentation to see the endpoint communication. https://tools.adidas-group.com/confluence/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=DEG&title=updateAccount

      • getNewsletterTopics

        public UpdateAccountRequest.NewsletterTopicId getNewsletterTopics()
        One to Many. The ids of the topics that the consumer has subscribed to. UpdateAccountRequest.NewsletterTopicId The list of ids sent will be updated in the DB. The ids that are not sent will be removed with the DB
        Returns:
        The newletter topics

      • addNewsletterTopic

        public UpdateAccountRequest addNewsletterTopic(java.lang.String newsletterId)
        One to Many. The ids of the topics that the consumer has subscribed to. UpdateAccountRequest.NewsletterTopicId The list of ids sent will be updated in the DB. The ids that are not sent will be removed with the DB
        Parameters:
        newsletterId -
        Returns:

      • getSubscriptions

        public UpdateAccountRequest.NewsletterTypeId getSubscriptions()
        One to Many relationship. The Ids of the newsletter type ids that the consumer has subscribed or to be subscribed for. The list of ids sent will be updated in DB. The ids which are present for the consumer but not in the request will be un subscribed. This is applicable only to those newsletter type ids that are configured for the site, others are untouched
        Returns:
        Consumer subscriptions.

      • addSubscription

        public UpdateAccountRequest addSubscription(java.lang.String subscriptionId)
        One to Many relationship. The Ids of the newsletter type ids that the consumer has subscribed or to be subscribed for. The list of ids sent will be updated in DB. The ids which are present for the consumer but not in the request will be un subscribed. This is applicable only to those newsletter type ids that are configured for the site, others are untouched
        Parameters:
        subscriptionId -
        Returns:
